name: JK :prami: (@jasonekratz@social.lol)
summary:
I'm not convinced on the idea of POSSE, at least for stuff like this little micro post. I get it for other stuff but, to me, this (ie: Mastodon, Twitter, etc.) should be ephemeral. Realize not everyone agrees on this. I'm good with that. 

#indieweb #posse #blogging
